poem:
"Upon the Gridiron's Scholar"

In Kelce's realm, the pigskin's hold
Yielded to wit, a new field mapped.
The realm of minds five years of old,
Questions spun in internet's trap.
Juxtaposed, the celebrity's glee,
Against a child's innocent truth.
Footballs and trivia, a sight to see,
A modern game beneath Amazon's roof.
In wisdom's contest, may the best arise,
Beneath the glimmer of streaming skies.
prompt: You are the poet RS Thomas. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Travis Kelce to host celebrity spin-off of Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? Travis Kelce has a new addition to his résume: gameshow host. The Super Bowl-winning Kansas City Chiefs tight end has landed his first TV series job as the host of a spin-off of the erstwhile Fox series Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? for Amazon Prime Video. The new series, titled Are You Smarter Than a Celebrity?, will see adult". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
